short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for enabling a sticky always-visible side tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
StickyTab: Multi-Tabbing With Efficacy

StickyTab is your ultimate solution for multi-tasking in Chrome! With StickyTab, you can transform the Chrome side panel into a sticky tab that stays visible at all times, allowing you to effortlessly view two tabs simultaneously. And you can choose between Desktop mode or Mobile mode (if provided by the website).

Whether you're writing an article on Google Docs and need to refer to research materials, or you want to work while watching YouTube videos, StickyTab has you covered. Keep your main tab active while accessing additional content in the side panel, or vice versa, to enhance your productivity and workflow.

Key Features:
- Transform Chrome side panel into a sticky tab for simultaneous viewing.
- Switching between mobile view and desktop view (if available)
- Stay focused on once main tab while accessing additional content on another tab.

NOTE:
This extension will drop X-Frame-Options and Content-Security-Policy HTTP response headers.
Use at your own risk because it disables important browser security mechanisms.
